long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a little extension that adds a context menu entry for opening magnet links into the Magneto windows client. All it does is forward the magnet url into the desktop client, which will then start streaming the torrent in VLC using peerflix (https://github.com/mafintosh/peerflix)
